      • getApplicationSvgIconUrl

        public abstract java.lang.String getApplicationSvgIconUrl()
        Return path to an svg file containing icon of the current version of the product. The path is a relative path inside the product's JAR files. It may return special icon for EAP builds.

      • getSmallApplicationSvgIconUrl

        public abstract java.lang.String getSmallApplicationSvgIconUrl()
        Return path to an svg file containing a variant of the product icon which is suitable for 16x16 images.

      • getApplicationSvgIconFile

        public abstract java.io.File getApplicationSvgIconFile()
        Return an svg file containing icon of the current version of the product. It may return special icon for EAP builds.

      • getToolWindowIconUrl

        public abstract java.lang.String getToolWindowIconUrl()

      • getWelcomeScreenLogoUrl

        public abstract java.lang.String getWelcomeScreenLogoUrl()

      • getPackageCode

        public abstract java.lang.String getPackageCode()
        This method is used to detect that the product isn't meant to be used as an IDE but is embedded to another product or used as a standalone tool so different licensing scheme should be applied.

      • showLicenseeInfo

        public abstract boolean showLicenseeInfo()

      • isEAP

        public abstract boolean isEAP()

      • isMajorEAP

        public abstract boolean isMajorEAP()
        Returns true only for EAP builds of "major" releases (i.e. for 2018.3, but not for 2018.3.1).

        public abstract boolean isEssentialPlugin(java.lang.String pluginId)
        Returns:
        true if the specified plugin is an essential part of the IDE so it cannot be disabled and isn't shown in Settings | Plugins
